name: forcemeat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
meat that has been chopped (= cut into very small pieces) and often mixed with vegetables, bread etc., used to fill other food before cooking: Add some chopped onion and herbs to the minced forcemeat. The sausage skins are stuffed with a forcemeat mixture. Compare
stuffing (FOOD)
farci
More examplesFewer examplesWrap the forcemeat in cabbage leaves and boil it in stock.The forcemeat is mostly used to stuff our sausages.The chicken was stuffed with a game forcemeat.The soup was full of delicate pork forcemeat balls.The dumplings were made with beef forcemeat, bound together with eggs.
